com.orchestranetworks.workflow
Interface MailSpec

public interface MailSpec

This interface provides the possibility to send mails in a workflow context.

See Also:
ProcessExecutionContext.createMailSpec()

Nested Class Summary
static class MailSpec.NotificationType
          Indicates the type of the notification.
 
Method Summary
 void notify(MailSpec.NotificationType recipientType, String mailAddress)
          Adds the mail address to the recipients list.
 void sendMail(Locale locale)
          Sends the mail using the mail specification.
 void setBody(String body)
          Sets the mail body.
 void setSubject(String subject)
          Sets the mail subject.
 void setTemplateMailId(int templateMailId)
          Specifies a template mail (with a subject and a body).
 void setUserContext(UserReference user)
          Defines a specific user for the mail context.
 

Method Detail

setSubject

public void setSubject(String subject)

Sets the mail subject.

Parameters:
subject - The mail subject. It can contain workflow variables which are automatically evaluated (dataContext variables or mail variables).
See Also:
Mail variables.

setBody

public void setBody(String body)

Sets the mail body.

Parameters:
body - The mail body. It can contain workflow variables which are automatically evaluated (dataContext variables or mail variables).
See Also:
Mail variables.

setTemplateMailId

public void setTemplateMailId(int templateMailId)

Specifies a template mail (with a subject and a body).

This template can be configured in the notification messages table (in the 'configuration' data set of the workflow definition data space).

Parameters:
templateMailId - The identifier of the mail template.

setUserContext

public void setUserContext(UserReference user)

Defines a specific user for the mail context.

Dynamic variables are evaluated in the context of this user.

notify

public void notify(MailSpec.NotificationType recipientType,
                   String mailAddress)

Adds the mail address to the recipients list.

Parameters:
recipientType - The recipient type to update.
mailAddress - The mail address to add as recipient.

sendMail

public void sendMail(Locale locale)
              throws OperationException

Sends the mail using the mail specification.

If a template mail identifier is specified, the mail is built and then sent. Else the mail is sent with the specified subject and body.

Parameters:
locale - The locale to use for variables evaluating.
Throws:
OperationException
